GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Convert product information to JSON format
GenAiPromptTemplate.masterLabel: Convert product information to JSON format

templateVersions.content:
Read the sentence below and extract each product code and its corresponding quantity. Then, refer to the provided product information list to match each product code to its corresponding Id. Finally, generate a JSON array in the following format: json [ { ProductId__c: "matched_id_1", Quantity__c: quantity_1 }, { ProductId__c: "matched_id_2", Quantity__c: quantity_2 } ] Sentence: {!$Input:inputUserText} Product Information List: json {!$Input:productsJsonText}
Requirements: Output only the JSON array — no extra explanation or commentary. Match ProductCode to Id exactly as given. Preserve the order in which products appear in the sentence. Each object must contain both ProductId__c and Quantity__c.
